        void updateParticipantActions(String conferenceId,
                              List<KandyMultiPartyConferenceParticipantActionParmas> participantActionParams,
                              KandyMultiPartyConferenceUpdateParticipantActionsListener listener)

        conferenceId - mandatory
        {@link - KandyMultiPartyConferenceParticipantActionParmas} participantActionParams - pair of participant id and the action you want to set to this participant
        {@link - KandyMultiPartyConferenceUpdateParticipantActionsListener} listener
